PartnershipSpecificationRoleRef.schema.j.description: Reference to the RoleSpecification reference contained within a given partnership specification.

href.description: The href of the containing partnership specification.

id.description: The id of the containing partnership specification.

name.description: The name of the partnership specification.

roleName.description: The name of the role specification - which should be defined within the partnership specification

@referredType.description: The actual type of the target instance when needed for disambiguation.
